detail_desc: Short dress in a crêpe weave with narrow notch lapels and a wrapover front with ties inside. Long sleeves with decorative, covered buttons at the cuffs and a detachable fabric belt at the waist with a covered metal buckle. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, textured cotton knit with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable mesh. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Fitted mesh top with long puff sleeves that are elasticated at the top for added volume.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and reflective detail.
Metal studs and earrings in various designs and sizes. Size from 0.3 cm to 1.4 cm.
Purl-knit jumper in a cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.
Wide trousers in cotton twill with a high waist, pleats at the top and wide legs with close-fitting hems. Covered elastication at the back of the waist and front and back pockets.
Long-sleeved hoodie in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with lightly padded, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a lace hem. No fasteners.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket and roll edges around the neckline and sleeves.
Short jersey skirt with an elasticated waist and draping at one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with gathers and elastication in the side seams for best fit.
Short dress in imitation leather with a round neckline, covered press-studs down the front, short, wide sleeves and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder jersey top with a double frill in woven fabric and narrow elastication at the top.
Jersey top with a sewn-in wrapover at the front, flared peplum, detachable tie belt at the waist and short, cuffed puff sleeves.

Thin running jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Hood with a small peak, zipped, diagonal chest pocket, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Mesh lining.
Knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave. Deep neckline with decorative gathers at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Tiered skirt for added width. Unlined.
Short top in soft, pleated jersey with a sheen. Narrow ribbed trim around the neckline, short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Thin running jacket in fast-drying, breathable, patterned functional fabric. Mesh-lined hood with a collar, taped zip at the front, ventilating mesh back, sleeve pocket with a concealed zip and taped reflective details.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Short A-line skirt.
Sleeveless dress in a jacquard weave containing glittery threads with a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a very wide skirt with a tulle underskirt. Lined.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waistband, side pockets and rounded hems. Contrasting colour stripes and trims at the sides and hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and lined drawstring hood. Long raglan sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Body in lace and mesh with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable horizontal strap at the back. Seam under the bust, a lined crotch with press-studs and cutaway coverage at the back.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high, wide, ribbed waist panel. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and jacquard-patterned details. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Poncho in a soft, fine knit with a diagonal neckline that creates a light draping effect over one shoulder. Length front and back approx. 95 cm.
Short dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Sewn-on tie belt at the waist, flap chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Short dress in sturdy jersey with lace trims. Round, lace-trimmed neckline, a concealed zip at the back, long sleeves and cuffs with concealed buttons. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and a zip fly and button.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Sports shorts in sturdy jersey with taped details, an elasticated drawstring waist and zipped side pockets.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.
High profile trainer boots in cotton canvas with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a mid waist with decorative straps, a lined gusset, narrow sides and half-string back.
Hooded top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Straight-cut pleated top in jersey with a slight sheen with narrow shoulder straps.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Joggers in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs. Soft jersey lining for extra warmth.
Long wrap dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, long sleeves and narrow ties that fasten around the waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, wide ties at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a small, lace stand-up collar, button placket and lace section at the top. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Wide tunic in a crisp cotton weave with a V-shaped opening and concealed buttons at the front. Slightly wider, 3/4-length sleeves, narrow, gathered cuffs, and a gathered seam at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
3/4-length trousers in jersey with covered elastication at the waist, a decorative bow at the front and wide, straight legs.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Legs with darker panels down the sides and narrow hems with a slit.

A-line dress in a cotton weave with small frill trim around the neckline, buttons at the back of the neck and short sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Gathered seam at the hem for added volume. Unlined.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Mini skirt in taffeta made from recycled polyester with a draped effect. Large, gathered flounces with overlocked edges down one side and a concealed zip with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Lined in chiffon made from recycled polyester.
Cap in woven fabric with a print motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Hat in felted fabric with a grosgrain band. Width of brim approx. 4.5 cm.

Sports bra in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a nursing function. Opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, a racer back with a cut-out section, wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless. Medium support.
Short-sleeved top in airy jersey with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a faux fur pompom at the top, and ribbed, turned-up hem.

Long-sleeved blouse in airy chiffon with an embroidered pattern, small frilled collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and seam with a wide flounce at the hem and cuffs. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the hips with a small frill trim and a flared skirt.

Lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a pile-lined drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, and concealed side pockets. Quilted lining.

Smartphone bag in imitation leather with a metal decoration at the front, a detachable, adjustable strap with metal fasteners at the ends, and three card compartments at the back. Width 9.7 cm. Height 16 cm.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar, a padded, pile-lined, drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud, an inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Sporty sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Round-necked, straight-cut T-shirt in soft premium cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave in a narrow cut at the top with short, braided shoulder straps. Opening at the front and an opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Sports bag in fast-drying functional fabric and mesh with two handles at the top and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 40x40x15 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic slub cotton jersey. Straight cut with a deep V-neck.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed silicone trim at the top. Wide elastication at the sides of the back. a concealed zip at the back and long legs.
Short, wide blouse in plumeti chiffon with an opening at the front and short sleeves with flared flounces. Opening and button at the back of the neck and a seam at the hem with a double flounce.
Elasticated fabric hair scrunchies with a bow.
Round metal studs. Diameter approx. 0.8 cm.
